issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://megagroup.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmegagroup.ru%2F) ### Comment > Пропущено уведомление куки. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ixclw2t2x340848ggwgw4okwkcgw44w41hyysx6ohq.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.21.1 (5081) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0` Browser: | Яндекс Браузер License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (0)

**Browser API**:
Block Location API,
Block Flash

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (megagroup.ru),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `1.8.11.44.47.55.59.63`, `User rules (url: none)`, `Malicious IP Blocklist (AdGuard) (url: https://malware-filter.gitlab.io/malware-filter/botnet-filter-ag.txt)`, `HaGeZi's Pop-Up Ads DNS Blocklist (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hagezi/dns-blocklists/main/adblock/popupads.txt)`, `HaGeZi's Fake DNS Blocklist (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hagezi/dns-blocklists/main/adblock/fake.txt)`, `HaGeZi's Light DNS Blocklist (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hagezi/dns-blocklists/main/adblock/light.txt)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
